meanings.definition: A group of alkaloids found in plants of the genus Veratrum.
meanings.sent1: Veratrins are natural compounds present in certain Veratrum plants.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of veratrins on human health.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners joked that the veratrins in the Veratrum plants were like tiny plant superheroes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the veratrins in the Veratrum plants.
meanings.sent5: The vivid green color of the Veratrum plants reminded her of the powerful veratrins they contained.

meanings.definition: A toxic substance derived from the plant Veratrum.
meanings.sent1: The poison control center warned about the dangers of veratrins ingestion.
meanings.sent2: Farmers take precautions to prevent livestock from coming into contact with veratrins.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally tasted the veratrins and made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: The rumors about the veratrins in the Veratrum plant spread like wildfire in the small town.
meanings.sent5: The smell of veratrins from the Veratrum plant was a clear warning to stay away.
